GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Responds with an array of comments for the given article_id

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a comment to a given article_id and responds with that comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increases the number of votes on an article

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all USERS

GET /api/articles?topic.description: filters the articles by the topic value specified in the query. If the query is omitted, the endpoint should respond with all articles
